720097f-a.text:
Grand Street, north side, east from and including Orchard Street. Public School No. 137, is shown on Grand Street, between Ludlow and
Essex Streets.
NE6 ~ 27(G  April 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
720097f-a.folder: Grand Street & Orchard Street, Manhattan, NY

732348f-a.title: Occupations - Peddlers - Clothing - Dry goods - Notions.
732348f-a.text:
Push-cart peddler selling beads at Grand and Orchard Streets.
April 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
732348f-a.folder: Grand Street and Orchard Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

720098f-a.text:
(1)
Grand Street, west from but not including Orchard Street. The view shows a pushcart market on the south side of Grand Street. Also shown is the Grand Street Station of the Second Ave., Elevated
on Allen Street.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, and showing a closer view of
peddler's market.
1923.
P. L. Sperr.
720098f-a.folder: Grand Street & Orchard Street, Manhattan, NY
